alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Pike (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 2:23PM EDT until March 29 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River below Big Branch near Molena affecting Meriwether and Pike Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Molena...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River below Big Branch near Molena. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EDT Monday the stage was 25.3 feet and slowly rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 30.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 28 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
